title: A Fun Time at the Movies with Immortality
description:
This week, we're discussing the latest Sam Barlow FMV game, Immortality. It's all about the history of cinema and auteur theory and, tragically, Chris Plante isn't here to explain what all of that means. Also, what other FMV performances have stolen our hearts? 

Also discussed: Dark Souls 2, Dark Cloud 2, Alan Wake, Simulacra, Diveki Games, Jetpack Joyride 2
author: thebestiesbizemail@gmail.com (Griffin McElroy, Justin McElroy, Russ Frushtick)
